scripts.db:reset: rimraf db/.wrangler && rimraf api/.wrangler && cd ./db && pnpm migrations:apply:local
scripts.migrations:apply:local: cross-env CI=true wrangler d1 migrations apply prod-long-game-core --local -c ./db/wrangler.toml --persist-to ./.wrangler
scripts.migrations:apply:remote: cross-env CI=true env-cmd wrangler d1 migrations apply prod-long-game-core --remote -c ./db/wrangler.toml --persist-to ./.wrangler
